title: Collectorz.com Movie Collector  5.6.1(with crack)
description:
DVD Database Software

Catalog your DVDs and Blu-Ray discs

Cast, crew, images, episode lists for TV series, etc...

Download it all by typing title or scanning barcode
Create a comprehensive DVD database

    * List all movie information, including cast, crew, studio, year, plot, etc...
    * Include DVD details, like screen ratios, subtitles, audio tracks, etc...
    * For TV Series, list all episode titles, first air-dates and plots. 

Then enjoy browsing your movie database on your computer

    * View your DVD database as a list or as gallery of cover images.
    * Group movies by genre, release year, format or any other property.
    * Find movies quickly, either by title, actor or anything you want.
    * Browse your movie database on Windows Media Center. 

[ Full feature list with screenshots ]
[Movie Collector main screen images view. Showing details for the Lost TV series] [Movie Collector main screen list view. Showing details for Pulp Fiction]
Add movies or TV series to your database in three easy steps

    * 1. Enter movie title to search our online DVD database and Amazon.
    * 2. Select your movie from the search results.
    * 3. Click the Add button to add it to your personal database. 

Movie Collector will automatically download data and images

    * All movie information: cast, crew, studio, release year, running time, genre, etc...
    * For TV Series: all episode titles.
    * All DVD details: screen ratios, subtitles, audio tracks, region, etc...
    * The box cover image. 

[Laser Barcode Scanner] [CueCat Barcode Scanner]
Want it even easier? Try cataloging your DVDs by barcode

    * No need to type movie titles, just use a scanner to scan the DVD barcode.
    * The search results will automatically return the exact edition that you own.
    * Try our deluxe laser scanner or the simple Cuecat scanner. 



Benefits of cataloging your DVD collection
Top 3 movies last week:
[1: Rambo (2008)] 	[2: National Treasure: Book of Secrets (2007)] 	[3: National Treasure (2004)]

    * Having a complete list of your DVDs in a safe place is ideal for for insurance purposes. Protect your valuable DVD collection. Think about it, a collection of 500 DVDs is easily worth over seven thousand dollars.
    * Ever came home with a new DVD, only to find out that you already owned it? Organizing your DVDs will prevent duplicate purchases and save money.
    * The Loan Manager will keep track of who borrowed your DVDs, so you don&#039;t lose sight of the movies you own.
    * And it&#039;s fun! Browsing your movies on screen is a great way to learn new facts about your collection and enjoy it more. You&#039;ll be amazed to find some gems that you haven&#039;t watched in a looooong time.
